title: TEST: Numbered Dropdown Questions
content: Testing how dropdown questions display with numbering

questions.instructions: Complete the dialogue by selecting the correct options from the dropdown menus.
questions.question:
Examiner: Do you think parents should allow children to watch television?
Candidate: Well, that's an interesting question. There are clearly some 1.[dropdown] where watching television does not negatively affect children. Some educational programmes, for example, can help 2.[dropdown].

mc_options.feedback: Correct! 'Situations' fits well in this context.
Not quite. 'Times' doesn't work as well with 'some' in this context.
Close, but not the best answer for the second blank.
Correct! 'Help children to learn' is the right construction.
